browse.description: Fetches a list of assets that may be filtered

get.description: Fetches one or more assets using the supplied id(s)

storeBatch.description: Stores one or more assets, either creating or wholly replacing

storeOne.description: Stores the supplied asset with the supplied id, either creating or wholly replacing

patch.description: Partially updates the existing stored asset with the supplied id

delete.description: Delete one or more assets using the supplied id(s)

alternativeIdentifiers.description: A map of alternative identifiers for this resource

filters.label: alternativeIdentifiers
filters.description: filter by the supplied alternative identifiers
filters.name: withAlternativeIdentifiers

deletedBy.description: The user that deleted (only applicable to deleted  resources)

reapAt.description: The timestamp for reaping (only applicable to deleted  resources)

allowedValues.label: m3u8

allowedValues.label: webvtt

checksum.description: Checksum for asset (32 character hex string)

contentRef.description: Reference to the content that this asset belong to

availabilityStartAt.description: The availability start date of the asset, or if not present available from the start of time

availabilityEndAt.description: The availability end date of the asset, or if not present available till the end of time

mediaInfo.description: Media specific info for the asset

audioTypes.description: Audio types available for the media asset

resolution.description: The overall resolution of the media asset

bitrate.description: The overall bitrate in kbps of the media asset

aspectRatio.description: The overall aspect ratio of the media asset

videoTracks.description: Video specific info for the asset

codec.description: The codec of the video track

duration.description: The duration of the video track

frameRate.description: The overall frame rate of the media asset

dubbedLanguages.description: Available dubbed languages for the media asset

language.description: The language of the audio track

channels.description: Total number of audio channels of the audio track
